Name: Tier List Tyrants
Host(s): Yvangi Jacques and Geena San Diego
Description: Tierlist Tyrants is the ultimate college radio show where your hosts, Yvangi and Geena, passionately debate, rank, and roast everything under the sun‚Äìdiving into the wild world of rankings from fast food chains and film franchises, to obscure memes and mythical creatures, to classic video games, and even the best campus study spots. Tierlist Tyrants delivers the definitive (and sometimes controversial) verdicts on what truly deserves S-tier status with lively debates, unexpected guest appearances, unfiltered takes, passionate arguments, and a lot of humor, passion, fun, and a touch of chaos to every ranking. In the world of Tierlist Tyrants, no ranking is safe, and only the strongest takes survive!
